document.discussion_title: Ashtead Group plc’s (AHT) “Neutral” Rating Reiterated at BNP Paribas
document.topic_text: Tweet Ashtead Group plc (LON:AHT) ‘s stock had its “neutral” rating reaffirmed by equities researchers at BNP Paribas in a research report issued to clients and investors on Monday. They currently have a GBX 1,050 ($13.52) price objective on the stock. BNP Paribas’ price objective points to a potential downside of 12.94% from the stock’s current price. AHT has been the topic of several other research reports. Deutsche Bank AG restated a “sell” rating on shares of Ashtead Group plc in a report on Monday, April 25th. Beaufort Securities restated a “buy” rating on shares of Ashtead Group plc in a report on Wednesday, June 15th. Jefferies Group restated a “buy” rating and set a GBX 1,385 ($17.83) price target on shares of Ashtead Group plc in a report on Thursday, May 26th. JPMorgan Chase & Co. restated an “overweight” rating and set a GBX 1,140 ($14.68) price target on shares of Ashtead Group plc in a report on Wednesday, June 15th. Finally, HSBC increased their price target on Ashtead Group plc from GBX 970 ($12.49) to GBX 1,225 ($15.77) and gave the company a “hold” rating in a report on Monday. Two investment analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating, two have issued a hold rating and ten have given a buy rating to the company’s stock. The stock presently has a consensus rating of “Buy” and an average target price of GBX 1,174.07 ($15.12). Ashtead Group plc ( LON:AHT ) opened at 1207.00 on Monday. Ashtead Group plc has a 52-week low of GBX 749.00 and a 52-week high of GBX 1,378.93. The stock’s market cap is GBX 6.05 billion. The stock has a 50 day moving average price of GBX 1,162.23 and a 200 day moving average price of GBX 966.65. //www.americanbankingnews.com/2016/08/22/ashtead-group-plcs-aht-neutral-rating-reiterated-at-bnp-paribas-3/ The company also recently declared a dividend, which will be paid on Friday, September 9th. Stockholders of record on Thursday, August 11th will be given a dividend of GBX 18.50 ($0.24) per share. This is a positive change from Ashtead Group plc’s previous dividend of $4.00. This represents a dividend yield of 1.88%. The ex-dividend date is Thursday, August 11th. In related news, insider Cole,Christopher sold 25,000 shares of the firm’s stock in a transaction dated Tuesday, July 26th. The stock was sold at an average price of GBX 1,186 ($15.27), for a total transaction of £296,500 ($381,792.43). Also, insider Edmunds,Wayne acquired 7,000 shares of the company’s stock in a transaction that occurred on Monday, July 4th. The shares were bought at an average cost of GBX 1,079 ($13.89) per share, for a total transaction of £75,530 ($97,257.28). Ashtead Group plc is a United Kingdom-based equipment rental company with networks in the United States and the United Kingdom. The Company operates through two business units: Sunbelt, which provides pump and power, climate control and scaffolding service, and A-Plant business, which operates through Eve Trakway Limited (Eve), which constructs temporary roadways and barriers; PSS, which offers trenchless technology and fusion services, and FLG (lifting) services. Receive News & Ratings for Ashtead Group plc Ashtead Group plc
